Optimor Ltd | Oxford,UK | Full-time | ONSITE | www.billmonitor.com/business

We are disrupting how people and businesses make purchasing decisions. Our Billmonitor service for mobile phone contracts has analysed over 1 million bills so far, helping people make informed choices based on their data.

You will be involved in the design, building and maintenance of all facets of our web-based bill analytics software; whether writing core data input code, improving our deployment and scaling processes, performing research or developing front-end code to improve our UX.

We're primarily looking for a Python developer, but experience in the following is also highly valued:

* Linux/Docker/AWS

* Data analysis

* Frontend (Angular)

The interview process involves a short coding task (1 hour), technical interview (on-site/Skype, as convenient) and an on-site interview to meet the whole team.

Full spec at https://business.billmonitor.com/join-the-team or feel free to email with any questions you have/if the position sounds interesting (jobs@billmonitor.com).
